They are outstanding external libraries used by ToyBox.
Some of those third-party projects in ToyBox have been modified or reduce size.


    boost-1.60.0            Boost Software License
    SFML-2.3.2              zlib License
    freetype-2.5.3          FreeType License or GPL License
    7zip-9.20               GNU LGPL
    p7zip-9.20.1            GNU LGPL
    glew-1.11.0             BSD License
    glm-0.9.5.4             MIT License
    lua-5.3.3               MIT License
    luapp-2.2.0             MIT License
    zlib-1.2.8              zlib License
    stb_image-2.16          Public Domain
    lz4-1.8.0               BSD 2-Clause License
